fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you attack them, you don't immediately attack them. You probably won't for a while.
- At the end of the game, when a winner would be declared, you will automatically deal an Unstoppable attack to all players you have previously attacked, even if you are dead.
- 2 use autovest.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Affect who wins the game in some way. Host decides if you win.
